name: TskTskTsk
description:
Inspired by Numberphile, I threw together this quick little 3-board tic-tac-toe game! Both players play with Xs, and the objective is to force your opponent to make the final row/column/diagonal.

Each board is eliminated once a row is completed in it, but your objective is to force your opponent to play the final X.

Play for free online or download the exe for Windows!
